QuestData.Title: The Mission
QuestData.Description: Well, you heard the King. Admiral Taylor's last transmission came from somewhere in the southern seas.$B$BWe will begin our search from the air! Locating the Prince - the White Pawn - is of critical priority.$B$BThe Skyfire is fueled, supplied, and ready to depart. She and her crew idle in the sky just north of the harbor.$B$BMake your last preparations, then meet Admiral Rogers on the deck. We will depart without delay.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Admiral Rogers on The Skyfire.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ah, a veteran of the Cataclysm campaigns! Good, I could use more experienced hands.
QuestData.RewardText: That's a whole Horde base down there! Where was our intel?$B$BWell $c, it's time to see what this upgraded gunship is capable of.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Admiral Rogers on The Skyfire gunship
Secure a flight to The Skyfire
